comment.author: 38714066@N00
comment._content: Looks like some sort of road equipment, maybe something to keep tar hot.

comment.author: 64339620@N07
comment._content: I am pretty certain that the woman in this photo is my mother who was at that time a City of Richmond official (the highest-ranking female at that time) working in the City Manager's office. The comment made by Seth Gaines that it looks like some kind of road equipment would make sense since she often dealt with various city departments.
